name: spreadsheetclone
description: This web app mimics Google Sheets with:   ✅ **Spreadsheet UI** (Light/Dark Mode, Column/Row Headers)   ✅ **Mathematical & Text Functions**   ✅ **Formula Parsing (`=A1+B1`, `=SUM(A1:A5)`)**   ✅ **Multi-Sheet Support**   ✅ **Real-Time Collaboration (WebSockets)**   ✅ **CSV/JSON Import & Export**   ✅ **Print & PDF Export**   ✅ **Google Sign-In & Firebase Storage**
